trans-unit.source: Bug Tracker
trans-unit.target: Rastreador de bichos

trans-unit.source: Bugs are tracked on GitHub Issues. In case of trouble, please check there if your issue has already been reported. If you spotted it first, help us smashing it by providing a detailed and welcomed feedback.
trans-unit.target: Bugs are tracked on GitHub Issues. In case of trouble, please check there if your issue has already been reported. If you spotted it first, help us smashing it by providing a detailed and welcomed feedback.

trans-unit.source: Contributors
trans-unit.target: Colaboradores

trans-unit.source: Credits
trans-unit.target: Créditos

trans-unit.source: Go to Sales > Configuration > Settings and check “Use leads if you need a qualification step before creating an opportunity or a customer” option.
trans-unit.target: Go to Sales > Configuration > Settings and check “Use leads if you need a qualification step before creating an opportunity or a customer” option.

trans-unit.source: Go to any lead in Sales > Sales > Leads, and click on the button “Convert to Opportunity”.
trans-unit.target: Go to any lead in Sales > Sales > Leads, and click on the button “Convert to Opportunity”.

trans-unit.source: In any moment, you can also set a registration for an event by clicking on button “Generate registration”, located in tab “Extra info” in marketing section in any lead or opportunity.
trans-unit.target: In any moment, you can also set a registration for an event by clicking on button “Generate registration”, located in tab “Extra info” in marketing section in any lead or opportunity.

trans-unit.source: In that section, you can select an event, and when you click on “Create opportunity”, the partner will be registered automatically in the event.
trans-unit.target: In that section, you can select an event, and when you click on “Create opportunity”, the partner will be registered automatically in the event.
In the resulting screen, if the conversion action is “Convert to opportunity” and you have selected a related partner (a new or an existing one), you will have a section called “Event registration”.

trans-unit.source: Jairo Llopis <jairo.llopis@tecnativa.com>
trans-unit.target: Jairo Llopis <jairo.llopis@tecnativa.com>

trans-unit.source: Maintainer
trans-unit.target: Mantenedor

trans-unit.source: OCA, or the Odoo Community Association, is a nonprofit organization whose mission is to support the collaborative development of Odoo features and promote its widespread use.
trans-unit.target: La OCA,o la Asociación de la Comunidad Odoo,es una organización sin fines de lucro cuya misión es apoyar el desarrollo colaborativo de las características de Odoo y promover su uso generalizado.

trans-unit.source: Pedro M. Baeza <pedro.baeza@tecnativa.com>
trans-unit.target: Pedro M. Baeza <pedro.baeza@tecnativa.com>

trans-unit.source: Rafael Blasco <rafabn@tecnativa.com>
trans-unit.target: Rafael Blasco <rafabn@tecnativa.com>

trans-unit.source: Register a lead directly in an event
trans-unit.target: Registrar una pista directamente en un evento

trans-unit.source: This module allows to register a lead directly in an event when converting this lead into a partner, so that you can save several steps.
trans-unit.target: Este módulo permite registrar una pista directamente en un evento al convertir esta pista en un socio,de modo que se pueden ahorrar varios pasos.

trans-unit.source: This module is maintained by the OCA.
trans-unit.target: Este módulo es mantenido por la OCA.

trans-unit.source: To contribute to this module, please visit https://odoo-community.org.
trans-unit.target: To contribute to this module, please visit https://odoo-community.org.

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso

trans-unit.source: Vicent Cubells <vicent.cubells@tecnativa.com>
trans-unit.target: Vicent Cubells <vicent.cubells@tecnativa.com>
